summary: Completed all deployment fixes: Fixed payment gateway controllers (SenangPay, Phonepe, Flutterwave, WorldPay) with proper null initialization and checks. Updated Apache configuration to correctly route /api requests to Laravel (not React) using RewriteEngine. Removed DNS settings from netplan and systemd-resolved. Configured sshpass for automatic password authentication. All services verified: MySQL, Apache, and React app (PM2) are running. API endpoints now return JSON from Laravel successfully.
current_status: Deployment complete and fully operational. All critical issues resolved: controllers fixed, Apache routing working, Laravel routes loading, API endpoints functional, React app accessible, DNS settings removed, SSH automation configured.
